title: Leave buster bug?
body: I didn't leave a single game in 3~4 months and today I just receive a thanks to said that I've been improve on not leaving game. Is this a bug or a joke?

replies.body: It takes a good while to for an account to get back into good standing for the Leaver Buster system. Basically it's telling you that you won't face the longer time bans if you do receive another punishment from Leaver Buster.
